tool.name: msPurity.combineAnnotations
tool.description: Combine, score and rank metabolite annotation results

param.name: sm_resultPth
param.label: Spectral matching result
param.help: The SQLite database generated from msPurity.spectralMatching

param.name: metfrag_resultPth
param.label: Metfrag result
param.help: The result of the MetFrag analysis (requires a column indicating the XCMS group ID and fragmentation spectra ID)

param.name: sirius_csi_resultPth
param.label: Sirius CSI:FingerID result
param.help: The result of the CSI:FingerID analysis (requires a column indicating the XCMS group ID and fragmentation spectra ID)

param.name: probmetab_resultPth
param.label: Probmetab result
param.help: The result of the Probmetab analysis (requires a column indicating the XCMS group ID and fragmentation spectra ID)

param.name: sm_weight
param.label: Spectral matching weight
param.help: all weights need to sum to 1

param.name: metfrag_weight
param.label: Metfrag weight
param.help: all weights need to sum to 1

param.name: sirius_csi_weight
param.label: Sirius CSI:FingerID weight
param.help: all weights need to sum to 1

param.name: probmetab_weight
param.label: Probmetab weight
param.help: all weights need to sum to 1

param.name: create_new_database
param.label: Create a new database for the results?
param.help: A copy will be made of the input SQLite spectral matching database and the results will be added to this copy. When False, the input SQLite database will be updated the results. Use False if you want to reduce storage space being used.

tool.help:
============================================================= Combine annotation results ============================================================= ----------- Description -----------
Tool to combine the annotation results from msPurity spectral matching, MetFrag, Sirius CSI:FingerID and probmetab based on weighted scores for each technique aligning each annotation by inchikey and XCMS grouped feature.
See Bioconductor documentation for more details, functions: msPurity::combineAnnotation()
----------- Outputs ----------- * combined_annotation_sqlite * combined_annotation_tsv
